channel.title: North by Northeast Journeys | Travels in Northeast India
channel.description: Recent content on North by Northeast Journeys | Travels in Northeast India

item.title: Roheen BE
Accomodation
item.description: As much as possible we try and keep things local for both, the authenticity and sustainabilty of it.

item.title: Active Adventures
item.description: We offer Active Adventure tours for the avid as well as novice, be it relaxed or a real test of determination and endurance.

item.title: ARUNACHAL PRADESH (EAST): Watershed of the Brahmaputra | Cycle Tour
item.description: Birth of the Brahmaputra Valley This cycling tour of Upper Assam and Eastern Arunachal Pradesh, the eastern most state of India takes you to the watershed of the mighty Brahmaputra River.

item.title: ASSAM: Jewels of the Brahmaputra | Family Holiday
item.description: Family exploration of the Brahmaputra Valley The setting for this family holiday is the lush Brahmaputra valley of Assam.

item.title: Assam: Sanctuaries of the Brahmaputra Valley
item.description: Cycling the high Himalayas This cycling tour of western Arunachal Pradesh takes you all the way to the periphery of beautiful Tawang.

item.title: ASSAM: Tea, Wildlife & Culture in the Brahmaputra Valley | Multi-Activity Tour
item.description: Up close and personal in the Brahmaputra Valley This multi-activity tour of Assam takes us to the Brahmaputra valley.

item.title: ASSAM: Wildlife Parks of the Brahmaputra Valley | Wildlife Tour
item.description: Jewels of the east Brahmaputra valley of Assam, is the geographical heart of northeastern India.

item.title: EASTERN ARUNACHAL PRADESH: Watershed of the Brahmaputra
item.description: Watershed of the Brahmaputra This cycling tour of Arunachal Pradesh, the eastern most state of India takes you to the watershed of the mighty Brahmaputra River.

item.title: MEGHALAYA: Natures Amusement Park
item.description: Cycling the high Himalayas This cycling tour of western Arunachal Pradesh takes you all the way to the periphery of beautiful Tawang.

item.title: MEGHALAYA: Walks in the clouds | Walking Holiday
item.description: Exploring the Abode of Clouds This Walking holiday takes you to beautiful Meghalaya, ‘The Abode of clouds’.

item.title: TRANS-MEGHALAYA: Backroads of Meghalaya | Motorcycle & Overland Tour
item.description: The abode of clouds explored Starting from Guwahati the capital of Assam, this motorcycle / overland tour takes you through little known secluded roads of Meghalaya.

item.title: WESTERN ARUNACHAL PRADESH & ASSAM: Monyul & Brahmaputa Valley | Cultural Journeys
item.description: Cycling the Himalayan far east The cycle tour of Mishmi Hills takes you to the far eastern flank of the Himalayas.

item.title: Ezhil Vasanthan
Food
item.description: There is a great variety in cuisines between the communities of this region.

item.title: Nature & Culture
item.description: These 8 states lying in the Indo-Burmese and the Himalayan Bio-diversity hotspots are also home to over 150 unique and distinct ethinic groups.

item.title: ARUNACHAL PRADESH (EAST): Walks in India's far east | Walking Holiday
item.description: Walks in India’s far east Arunachal Pradesh, ‘the dawn lit Mountains’ is the easternmost state of India.

item.title: ARUNACHAL PRADESH (West): High roads of the Monyul region | Motorcycle & Overland Tour
item.description: Riding along the Bhutan and Tibetian borders This Motorcycle / Overland tour takes you to Western Arunachal Pradesh which includes some of the highest motorable roads of the eastern Himalayas.

item.title: ASSAM: Family escape to the Brahmaputra Valley
item.description: Cycling the Himalayan far east The cycle tour of Mishmi Hills takes you to the far eastern flank of the Himalayas.

item.title: EASTERN ARUNACHAL & ASSAM: Theravada & Animist lands | Cultural Journeys
item.description: Abode of the Clouds Meghalaya’ meaning the Abode of clouds is one of the wettest places on earth during the monsoons.

item.title: MEGHALAYA: Hike, Bike & Culture in the abode of clouds | Multi-Activity Tour
item.description: Hike and bike in The Abode of Clouds This particular Multi-activity tour takes us on bicycles and on foot across the Khasi and Jaintia Hills of Meghalaya.

item.title: MEGHALAYA: Natures Amusement Park | Family Holiday
item.description: Family adventures in the Khasi & Jaintia hills This Adventure holiday for the family is set in hilly Meghalaya.

item.title: MEGHALAYA: The Abode of clouds | Cycle Tour
item.description: The Khasi and Jaintia hills explored on bicycles. Meghalaya’ meaning the Abode of clouds is a green hilly state perched between the great plains of Bangladesh and that of Assam.

item.title: MEGHALAYA: Walks in the clouds
item.description: Abode of the Clouds The Walkers tour of Meghalaya takes you to the ’ Abode of the clouds’ , a hilly state jutting out between the vast plains of the Brahmaputra valley on the north and the plains of Bangladesh on the south.

item.title: WESTERN ARUNACHAL PRADESH: Call of the Mountains
item.description: Walks in India’s far east Arunachal Pradesh, ‘the dawn lit Mountains’ is the easternmost state of India.

item.title: Manjit Saikia
Laidback Leisure
item.description: Holidays that take you away from the maddening crowds, kick off your shoes, destress and enjoy the serenity while we take care of the rest.

item.title: Visa & Permits
item.description: Our Wildlife & Culture Tours Visa Special Permits

item.title: ARUNACHAL PRADESH (EAST): Hike, Bike, Raft & Culture in India's far east | Multi-Activity Tour
item.description: Birth of one of the greatest river valleys This multi-activity tour of eastern Arunachal Pradesh takes us on bicycles, rafts and on foot across the watershed area of the Brahmaputra River valley.

item.title: ARUNACHAL PRADESH: India's far east | Family Holiday
item.description: Far eastern explorations This active adventure holiday for the family is set in the vast flatlands of the Brahmaputra, Lohit and Dibang rivers of eastern Arunachal Pradesh and Upper Assam.

item.title: ASSAM & ARUNACHAL PRADESH: Around the Brahmaputra Valley
item.description: The high lakes trek of Western Arunachal Pradesh This particular trek is situated in Western Arunachal Pradesh, in the states Buddhist belt.

item.title: ASSAM & ARUNACHAL PRADESH: Around the Brahmaputra Valley | Motorcycle & Overland Tour
item.description: Hills, Valleys, Forests, Rivers and Tribes Starting from central Assam we make our war east and north along the mighty Brahmaputra River.

item.title: ASSAM & ARUNACHAL PRADESH: The Brahmaputra explorer | Cycle Tour
item.description: Cycling the physical heart of Northeastern India This tour takes you cycling along the length of the Brahmaputra River, across parts of Assam and Arunachal Pradesh.

item.title: ASSAM & ARUNACHAL PRADESH: The Brahmaputra Valley explorer
item.description: Walks in India’s far east Arunachal Pradesh, ‘the dawn lit Mountains’ is the easternmost state of India.

item.title: EASTERN ARUNACHAL PRADESH: Walks in India's far east
item.description: Walks in India’s far east Arunachal Pradesh, ‘the dawn lit Mountains’ is the easternmost state of India.

item.title: MEGHALAYA: Hike and bike in the abode of clouds
item.description: Hike and bike in Abode of Clouds This particular Multi- activity tour of Meghalaya takes us on bicycles and on foot across the Khasi and Jaintia Hills The Khasi and Jaintia hills due to its high rain fall has an amazing mix of forested valleys and grassland plateaus.

item.title: NAGALAND & ASSAM: Hornbill Festival and the Brahmaputra Valley
item.description: Watershed of the Brahmaputra This cycling tour of Arunachal Pradesh, the eastern most state of India takes you to the watershed of the mighty Brahmaputra River.

item.title: SIKKIM & W BENGAL: Singalila Ridge and the Barsey Rhododendron Sanctuary | Trekking Holiday
item.description: A Trek amongst the giants The hills of North Bengal and Sikkim are a mystical land of abundant natural beauty with verdant forests, quaint sub alpine villages and high towering mountains.

item.title: Iho Mitapo
Road Conditions
item.description: The Road condition across the northeastern states vary between excellent to the most atrocious.

item.title: ARUNACHAL PRADESH (WEST): The high lakes trek | Trekking Holiday
item.description: Life along the Bhutanese frontier This particular trek is set in Western Arunachal Pradesh, in the states Buddhist belt close to the tri-junction between India, Tibet and Bhutan.

item.title: ARUNACHAL PRADESH: Call of the Mountains | Family Holiday
item.description: Walks in India’s far east Arunachal Pradesh, ‘the dawn lit Mountains’ is the easternmost state of India.

item.title: ARUNACHAL PRADESH: Hike and Bike in the Monyul region | Multi-Activity Tour
item.description: Active & Interactive in the High Himalayas This multi-activity tour is situated in Western Arunachal Pradesh, in the states Buddhist belt.

item.title: EASTERN ARUNACHAL PRADESH: Festival hop | Cultural Journeys
item.description: Watershed of the Brahmaputra This cycling tour of Arunachal Pradesh, the eastern most state of India takes you to the watershed of the mighty Brahmaputra River.

item.title: MEGHALAYA: Abode of the clouds
item.description: Abode of the Clouds Meghalaya’ meaning the Abode of clouds is one of the wettest places on earth during the monsoons.

item.title: MEGHALAYA: The Trans-Meghalaya Explorer | Cycle Tour
item.description: Cycling the Garo, Khasi and Jaintia hills The Trans Meghalaya cycling tour takes us across the three hill ranges of the state.

item.title: WESTERN ARUNACHAL PRADESH: The high lakes trek
item.description: The high lakes trek of Western Arunachal Pradesh This particular trek is situated in Western Arunachal Pradesh, in the states Buddhist belt.

item.title: Joho Tayu
Safety
item.description: We offer Active Adventure tours for the avid as well as novice, be it relaxed or a real test of determination and endurance.

item.title: 4 STATES NORTH EAST INDIA: The Eastern Arc | Motorcycle & Overland Tour
item.description: The wildest of Northeast India This particular ride takes us through the backroads of some of India’s easternmost states namely Arunachal Pradesh, Nagaland, Assam and Meghalaya.

item.title: ARUNACHAL PRADESH (EAST): The Mishmi Hills Explorer | Cycle Tour
item.description: Cycling the Himalaya’s far eastern end The cycle tour of Mishmi Hills takes you to the far eastern flank of the Himalayas, this is where the mighty Himalayan chain ends (or starts).

item.title: ARUNACHAL PRADESH: Mishmi Hills Explorer | Wildlife Tour
item.description: Cycling the Himalayan far east The cycle tour of Mishmi Hills takes you to the far eastern flank of the Himalayas.

item.title: BHUTAN: Belly of the Thunder Dragon | Motorcycle & Overland Tour
item.description: The Monastic Trail This cycling tour of Sikkim and W Bengal takes us through East, South and Western districts of Sikkim and the Darjeeling district of W Bengal.

item.description: Hike, Bike and Raft in India’s far east This multi-activity tour of eastern Arunachal Pradesh takes us on bicycles, rafts and on foot across the watershed area of the Brahmaputra River.

item.description: Cycling the Garo, Khasi and Jaintia hills The Trans Meghalaya cycling tour takes us across the three hill ranges of the state.

item.description: The Monastic Trail This cycling tour of Sikkim and West Bengal takes us through East, South and Western districts of Sikkim and the Darjeeling district of West Bengal.
